description:
【Game Introduction】
Persha and the Magic Labyrinth is a new type of puzzle RPG that combines 3-match puzzle and dungeon RPG.
Control the main character, a young girl named “Persha,” to solve the mysteries of the tower and capture her nemesis “Rock”!

【The basic rule is 3-match puzzle!】
This is a puzzle game in which you match three identical pieces vertically or horizontally to make them disappear.
You will clear the stage when “Persha”  reaches “Rock”, who appears after you erase key pieces.

【Move Persha to conquer the puzzle!】
The main character Persha can freely move up, down, left, and right, regardless of the 3 matches.
Use Persha as a starting point to erase pieces, defeat enemies, and conquer the puzzle!

【Mystery hidden in the tower!? Magic Cat Missions!】
Each stage has a hidden “Magic Cat” with special powers.
When you solve the hidden mysteries in the tower, the “Magic Cat” will reveal itself and help Persha.
Let’s conquer all 120 stages together with the Magic Cats!
name: Persha and the Magic Labyrinth -Arabian Nyaights-
